duties_responsibilities.duty: Operate a commercial vehicle to transport live birds to the processing plant, ensuring a safe work environment and adherence to company policies.
Pick up loaded trailer with empty cages, transport them to the poultry farm, release ratchets on cages, load birds, secure cages with ratchet straps, and transport to the processing plant.
Drop the loaded trailer in the holding shed and complete required logbook.

education_certification.credential: Minimum 21 years of age, with a valid Class A CDL and clear CDL record, must pass background check, DOT drug screen, and physical. Ability to lift 40 lbs occasionally, work flexible hours, and be exposed to outside temperatures and environments.
